data:
AIandMe is a platform for testing, evaluating, and securing LLM-based applications.
It helps developers ensure that AI models are safe, aligned with business goals, and free from vulnerabilities at every stageâ€”development, production, and post-deployment.
data.ï¸-aiandme-structure#ğŸ› ï¸ AIandMe Stru:
AIandMe follows a simple structure based on organizations and projects:ğŸ”¹ Organization â†’ The top-level management unit. Organizations handle team collaboration, security settings, and billing.
ğŸ”¹ Projects â†’ Each AI model (e.g., a chatbot or GenAI assistant) is managed under a project. Projects define business rules, safety checks, and testing workflows.ğŸ’¡ Example:
A company working on multiple AI assistants (one for customer support and one for internal knowledge) would create two separate projects under the same organization.
data.-aiandme-in-action#ğŸ” AIandMe in Action: AIandMe applies advanced security techniques to help teams test, refine, and protect AI applications at different stages:
data.1ï¸âƒ£-development-phase-ai-testing--sec:
Before deploying your AI, AIandMe helps you test it under real-world conditions.âœ… Adversarial Prompt Testing â†’ Runs automated stress tests against your model.
âœ… LLM-as-a-Judge (from your article) â†’ Uses AI itself to evaluate AI-generated responses.
âœ… Iterative Refinement â†’ Helps fine-tune model responses based on security insights.
data.2ï¸âƒ£-production-phase-real-time-protec:
Once your AI is live, AIandMe monitors and filters user prompts to prevent unintended behavior.âœ… AI Firewall (from your second article) â†’ Detects risky or out-of-scope queries and blocks them in real time.
âœ… Fine-Tuning Support â†’ Uses insights from penetration testing to continuously improve the AI model.
âœ… LLM Oversight â†’ Ensures AI doesnâ€™t hallucinate or provide misleading answers.
data.3ï¸âƒ£-post-deployment-ai-auditing--moni:
Even after deployment, AIandMe provides continuous security & compliance checks.âœ… Regular Log Audits â†’ Reviews past conversations to identify patterns of AI misbehavior.
âœ… Enhanced LLM-as-a-Judge â†’ Evaluates past AI outputs for bias, security issues, and compliance violations.
âœ… Human Expert Review â†’ Helps teams manually inspect flagged AI responses.
